issue.title: cmake or nmake not producing package config

content.raw: Hey I am currently having a similar problem but only this time it happens when I try to "..\\configure Debug" the sdformat file I’ve "..\\configure Debug" the ign-math with no issues. I've followed all the steps correctly I can’t seem to spot the error.
content.html: Hey I am currently having a similar problem but only this time it happens when I try to "..\configure Debug" the sdformat file I’ve "..\configure Debug" the ign-math with no issues. I've followed all the steps correctly I can’t seem to spot the error.
